item.title: FBI Subpoena Targets How Cuyahoga County Judge Leslie Celebrezze Steered Work to Friend
item.description: The grand jury subpoena also focuses on Mark Dottore’s company, which has earned more than $500,000 in fees from the court since 2017.

item.title: How Trump Is Trying to Expand the Already Colossal U.S. Prison System
item.description: The administration’s efforts — from mass deportation to harsher punishments for some crimes — rely on access to more prison and jail cells.

item.title: Search Mississippi Criminal Justice Bills as They Move Through the Legislature
item.description: Use our interactive bill tracker to stay informed on changes to courts, policing, prisons and more.

item.title: Prison Wedding Rules: No Cake, No Lace, But Lots of Love
item.description: St. Louis activist Khanika Harper found the perfect way to marry her passion for justice with the power of love: She became a prison wedding officiant...

item.title: Got a Story About the Justice System in St. Louis? We’re All Ears
item.description: Your input helps us decide what issues The Marshall Project - St. Louis should dig into next.
